review: It works well, however there's a pretty big flaw in that after a few days it starts lagging and performing poorly. Needs to be manually reset every so often. It seems like if this is an issue they should just have it reset every night after a few hours of no use or something.

review: I've had this stick for quite awhile now. It has great features but my main issue is the glitching. I thought it must be my internet speed. Nope because I have a roku and a chromcast. Both never glitches or has to reboot. I have reboot, cleaned it, and reconnected to wifi. Still no change. I would think twice before getting this stick.
